name: Spiritual Weapon of Conjuration
description: [Active, Square] Summon a weapon in an unoccupied slot within range. This weapon can move up to half your Magic (MAG) value, has as many Hit Points (HP) as 2 times your MAG, and deals 1 ID + P(MAG) +2 damage. It is placed before you in the initiative order. It attacks with a skill equal to your Aura.
